issue.message: Method `onForegroundImportanceChanged()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.sandboxClientImportanceListener())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `onForegroundImportanceChanged` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_SANDBOX_CLIENT_IMPORTANCE_LISTENER) to transfer requirement to caller`)

Method `onForegroundImportanceChanged()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.sandboxClientImportanceListener())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `onForegroundImportanceChanged` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_SANDBOX_CLIENT_IMPORTANCE_LISTENER) to transfer requirement to caller`)
